metadata.title: CVE-2012-3389 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.description:
Multiple cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerabilities inmod/lti/typessettings.php in Moodle 2.2.x before 2.2.4 and 2.3.x before2.3.1 allow remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the(1) lti_typename or (2) lti_toolurl parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-3389` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: moodle package in esm-apps/bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
